definition: (used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
to put on a hat/to be first/to dub

sentences.english: It was important to get a good result before the Celtic tie.
sentences.chinese: 在對陣凱子的歐冠比賽前，獲得一場大勝是如此重要。

sentences.english: You saw the goal disallowed the other day in the Championship.
sentences.chinese: 你可以看到在歐冠賽場上曾有的誤判。

sentences.english: His Champions League record might explain Alex Ferguson's decision.
sentences.chinese: 他的歐冠記錄也許可以解釋弗格的決定。

sentences.english: I want to help Slavia in the Czech league as well as in the Champions League qualification.
sentences.chinese: 我想幫助斯拉維亞隊在捷克聯賽中獲得歐冠參賽資格。

sentences.english: Tottenham are involved in the Champions League still and have plenty of games.
sentences.chinese: 熱刺還要打歐冠，已經其他的比賽。

sentences.english: We would like to have a Champions League with more teams.
sentences.chinese: 我們也願意有一個更多俱樂部參賽的歐冠。

sentences.english: Next summer's European Championship finals means a similar clash is inevitable.
sentences.chinese: 下賽季的歐冠決賽也將不可避免地面臨相同情況。

sentences.english: It is good news that I can play in the Champions League this season.
sentences.chinese: 能踢本賽季的歐冠聯賽對我來說是個天大的好消息。

sentences.english: It has been several years since Real Madrid have played in the quarterfinals of the Champions League.
sentences.chinese: 皇馬已經有好幾年沒能打進歐冠的四分之一決賽了。

sentences.english: At number one has to be my header in the Champions League final.
sentences.chinese: 排名第一的進球是我在歐冠決賽中頂進的頭球。

sentences.english: Fergie's right about the quality in the Champions League.
sentences.chinese: 弗格森對歐冠球隊質量和水平的看法很正確。

sentences.english: He joined Arsenal in the summer of 2008 after theEuropean Championships.
sentences.chinese: 2008年歐冠結束後的那個夏天，他加盟阿森納。

sentences.english: I look at the European Cup as our biggest disappointment to be honest with you.
sentences.chinese: 誠實的說我覺得歐冠是最讓人失望的。

sentences.english: They have already won it and have been there a few times in the final part of the Champions League.
sentences.chinese: 他們已經贏得過冠軍，參加過幾次歐冠決賽。

sentences.english: Obviously if you can put the Champions League on your CV it looks quite nice.
sentences.chinese: 顯然如果你可以把歐冠加入收藏，那看起很不錯。

sentences.english: The goal will make it into every Champions League trailer.
sentences.chinese: 這粒絕殺將會入選每次歐冠聯賽的集錦。

definition: Real Madrid soccer team/abbr. for 皇家馬德里|皇家马德里
Barca (nickname for FC Barcelona)/Baza (town in Grenada, Spain)
FC Internazionale Milano (football club)/abbr. for 國際米蘭足球俱樂部|国际米兰足球俱乐部[Guo2 ji4 Mi3 lan2 Zu2 qiu2 Ju4 le4 bu4]
to seize the crown/fig. to win a championship/to win gold medal
poised for battle/to square up for a fight
